scripts.website:watch-build: npx nodemon --watch packages/website --ext js --exec "cd packages/website; npm run build"
scripts.core:coverage: cd packages/core && npx hardhat coverage --network localhost
scripts.polly:deploy: cd packages/core && npx hardhat polly:deploy --network localhost
scripts.polly:test: cd packages/core && npx hardhat test test/polly.js
scripts.polly:watch: npx nodemon --watch packages/core/contracts --watch packages/core/test -e sol,js --exec "npm run polly:test"
scripts.module:watch: npx nodemon --watch packages/core/contracts --watch packages/core/test -e sol,js --exec "npm run module:test --name=$npm_config_name"
